channel.title: Welcome on Viviana Carcaiso
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Viviana Carcaiso

item.title: My research
item.description:
Research interests: univariate and multivariate extreme value theory, envirnonmental data analysis, Bayesian methods, machine learning for extremes.

Last preprint:
Carcaiso, V., de Carvalho, M., Prosdocimi, I., Antoniano-Villalobos, I. (2025). Bayesian mixture models for heterogeneous extremes. arXiv:2509.15359
